english.segment2: Do me a favor. Would you sing this to me slow. Cuz I'm thinkin' its my song
english.segment3: Do me a favor. Would you tell me when to let go. Cuz I think I'm holdin' on
english.segment4: Would you do it for me. Would you do it for me. Cuz I'm playin' for keeps
english.segment5: Tell me tommorow has come. With open arms. Open arms. Open arms. If you say it's time to move on. Then I'll stop holdin' on. Holdin' on. If you say that its time for movin' on
english.segment7: Do me a favor. Would you tell me which way's up. Cuz I dont know where I fit
english.segment8: Do me a favor. Would you tell me when to stop. Cuz I dont know how to quit
english.segment9: Would you do it for me. Would you do it for me. Cuz I'm playin' for keeps
english.segment10: Tell me tommorow has come. With open arms. Open arms. Open arms. If you say it's time to move on. Then I'll stop holdin' on. Holdin' on. If you say that its time for movin' on. Yeah. Time for movin' on
english.segment11: Do me a favor. Do me a favor. Cuz I'm playin' for ... keeps
english.segment12: Tell me tommorow has come. With open arms. Open arms. Open arms. If you say it's time to move on. Then I'll stop holdin' on. Holdin' on. If you say that its time 4 movin' on. (if you say). Yeah, time for movin' on. (if you say). Yeah, time for movin' on
